_header: Man if thou a wise man art / Of they goods take thy part
_description: Against leaving goods for executors; one seven-line stanza.

OxfBal354.Transcription:
Man yff thou a wyseman arteOf thy goodis take thy parteOr thow
                    hens wendeYf thou leve thy parteIn thy executours awardeThy parte
                    no parteys at the last end
OxfBal354.Facsimiles:
Early Manuscripts at Oxford University: Facsimile

BLAdd16165.First Lines:
Man if þow wys arteOf þy gode take þy
                    parte…
BLAdd16165.Last Lines: …þy parte no parteat þe latter eende

Hulme,  William Henry,
